content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)

### Copper plate factory
No copper plate factory has been built yet.

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) and inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities
-  Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected with pipes before attempting to connect them.
### Errors when checking inventory
-  Make sure to check the inventory of the correct entity (e.g., chest or inserter) before attempting to use items from it.
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure that the tile where you want to place an entity is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place it.
### Errors when extracting items
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
